title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the File Type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the File Type. The icon has also changed from the parent Java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When performing a SaveAs operation on an existing Java file, the file extension is not retained. Additionally, the file icon is changed to a generic file icon instead of the original Java file icon.
EB: When performing a SaveAs operation on an existing Java file, the file extension should be retained and the file icon should remain the same as the original Java file icon.
SR:
To reproduce:
1) Open an existing Java file.
2) Make modifications to the file (e.g., move an existing class).
3) Click on the SaveAs icon located next to the Save Icon.
4) In the dialog that appears, browse for a valid container location.
5) Type the filename without providing the file extension (as it is not requested).
6) Click OK.

Observe that the Navigator adds the file in the specified location, but the file extension is not displayed.
